title: Midnight Desire
description: In 1349 Scotland, Gillian, an immortal shapeshifter, succumbs to forbidden passion with mortal Aimery Fitz Clare, a master falconer who captures her heart, in Catching Midnight, and in Luisa's Desire, Luisa, an immortal desperate to escape her dangerous desires, journeys to a spiritual refuge in Tibet, where she discovers true passion. Original. 25,000 first printing.
author: Emma Holly
